stack:stack.stack:script: if [ -d /sys/firmware/efi ]; then netboot=`efibootmgr | awk '/^BootCurrent:/{print $2;}'` [ ! -z $netboot ] && echo $netboot > /tmp/uefi_netboot fi
systemctl enable uefi-boot-method systemctl start uefi-boot-method
